headline: Compared to Estimates, Assurant (AIZ) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: The headline numbers for Assurant (AIZ) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2024, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

raw.headline: Compared to Estimates, Assurant (AIZ) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics

headline: Assurant (AIZ) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Assurant (AIZ) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 10.62% and 2.60%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Assurant (AIZ) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
raw.summary: Assurant (AIZ) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 10.62% and 2.60%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Assurant: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of three analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $4.33 per share. The insurer posted revenue of $3.1 billion in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $3.13 billion, which also topped Street forecasts.

raw.headline: Assurant: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of three analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $4.33 per share. The insurer posted revenue of $3.1 billion in the period. Its adjusted revenue was $3.13 billion, which also topped Street forecasts.

headline: Assurant Reports Fourth Quarter 2024 and Full-Year Financial Results
summary: ATLANTA, February 11, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced results for the fourth quarter and full-year ended December 31, 2024.
